all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
For if you keep my commandments you shall receive of his fulness, and be glorified in me as I am in the Father; therefore, I say unto you, you shall receive grace for grace.
Doctrine and Covenants 93:20
Quote of the Day
"To all who recognize what you have lost, we invite you to come back so you can once again taste the joyous fruit of the gospel."
Elder S. Mark Palmer | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
